name: Stadium Heroes
description:
Practice a multitude of sports, such as athletics, horse riding, cycling, and even swimming in different environments.

Personalize your athlete and unlock new characters.

Improve your skills and fitness thanks to the training and medical centers.

Each sport has several levels and it is up to you to go for the gold medals and break the records of players from across the globe.

Stadium Heroes offers intuitive gameplay, is easy to learn, and is suitable for beginners as well as experienced players.

Don’t wait any longer! Download the game and get active now!

Will you break any records?


------------------------------
*Half of the games offer unlimited access with no obligation to purchase. In-app purchases unlock the other half of the games, remove advertising, and improve the skills of your athlete. Future updates will offer new characters and new sports games. If you have already purchased a pack, you will have access to these games free of charge.
